status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: Currently, the only way to communicate between webviews and the app is with evalJS() after the "load" event has fired. Would be great if we could trigger events manually so we won't have to refresh/reload or redirect the webviews first.
fields.summary: Android: support firing events in webView with remote content

comments.body: Hello, Thanks for the request. Can you attach a PR here?
